languages.text: At the start of each of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g}, the Officer uses {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voice of Command{/g} on a random ally that is not {g|Encyclopedia:Overexerted}overexerted{/g}. This ally will not suffer the overexerted effect and can be targeted by {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voice of Command{/g} again.
languages.original_text: В начале каждого своего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}офицер{/g} использует Приказ командира на случайного союзника, не получившего перенапряжение. Этот союзник не получает эффект "{g|Encyclopedia:Overexerted}перенапряжение{/g}" и сможет снова стать целью Приказа командира.

traits.locale_text: At the start of each of the Leader's turns, the Leader uses Voice of Command on a random ally that is not overexerted. This ally will not suffer the overexerted effect and can be targeted by Voice of Command again.

At the start of each of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g}, the Officer uses Voice of Command on a random ally that is not {g|Encyclopedia:Overexerted}overexerted{/g}. This ally will not suffer the overexerted effect and can be targeted by Voice of Command again.

At the start of each of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g}, the Officer uses Voice of Command on a random ally that is not {g|Encyclopedia:Overexerted}overexerted{/g}. This ally will not suffer the overexerted effect and can be targeted by Voice of Command again.

languages.text: 在{g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}军官{/g}的每个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时，军官会随机对一名没有受到过度疲劳效果影响的盟友使用{g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}指挥之声{/g}。被选定的盟友不会受到{g|Encyclopedia:Overexerted}过度疲劳{/g}效果的影响，而且可以再次被指定为{g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}指挥之声{/g}的目标。
languages.original_text: At the start of each of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g}, the Officer uses {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voice of Command{/g} on a random ally that is not {g|Encyclopedia:Overexerted}overexerted{/g}. This ally will not suffer the overexerted effect and can be targeted by {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voice of Command{/g} again.

traits.locale_text: 在领袖的每个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时，领袖会随机对一名没有受到“过度疲劳”效果影响的盟友使用指挥之声。被选定的盟友不会受到“过度疲劳”{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}效果{/g}的影响，而且可以再次被指定为指挥之声的目标。

languages.text: Al comienzo de cada uno de sus {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turnos{/g}, el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}oficial{/g} puede usar {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voz de mando{/g} sobre un aliado al azar que no esté {g|Encyclopedia:Overexerted}extenuado{/g}. Este aliado no sufrirá el efecto extenuado y podrá volver a ser objetivo de {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voz de mando{/g}.
languages.original_text: At the start of each of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g}, the Officer uses {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voice of Command{/g} on a random ally that is not {g|Encyclopedia:Overexerted}overexerted{/g}. This ally will not suffer the overexerted effect and can be targeted by {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voice of Command{/g} again.

traits.locale_text: Al comienzo de cada uno de sus {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turnos{/g}, el oficial puede usar Voz de mando sobre un aliado al azar que no esté {g|Encyclopedia:Overexerted}extenuado{/g}. Este aliado no sufrirá el efecto extenuado y podrá volver a ser objetivo de Voz de mando.

languages.text: 各{g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}士官{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始時、{g|Encyclopedia:Overexerted}過労状態{/g}ではないランダムな仲間1体に指揮の声を使う。対象の仲間は過労状態の効果を受けることなく、ふたたび指揮の声の対象者となることができる。
languages.original_text: At the start of each of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g}, the Officer uses Voice of Command on a random ally that is not {g|Encyclopedia:Overexerted}overexerted{/g}. This ally will not suffer the overexerted effect and can be targeted by Voice of Command again.

traits.locale_text: 各{g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}士官{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始時、{g|Encyclopedia:Overexerted}過労状態{/g}ではないランダムな仲間1体に指揮の声を使う。対象の仲間は過労状態の効果を受けることなく、ふたたび指揮の声の対象者となることができる。

languages.text: В начале каждого своего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}офицер{/g} использует {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Приказ командира{/g} на случайного союзника, не получившего перенапряжение. Этот союзник не получает эффект {g|Encyclopedia:Overexerted}перенапряжение{/g} и сможет снова стать целью {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Приказа командира{/g}.
languages.original_text: At the start of each of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g}, the Officer uses {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voice of Command{/g} on a random ally that is not {g|Encyclopedia:Overexerted}overexerted{/g}. This ally will not suffer the overexerted effect and can be targeted by {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voice of Command{/g} again.

traits.locale_text: В начале каждого своего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}офицер{/g} использует {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Приказ командира{/g} на случайного союзника, не получившего перенапряжение. Этот союзник не получает эффект {g|Encyclopedia:Overexerted}перенапряжение{/g} и сможет снова стать целью {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Приказа командира{/g}.

В начале каждого своего хода лидер использует Приказ командира на случайного союзника, не получившего перенапряжение. Этот союзник не получает эффект "перенапряжение" и сможет снова стать целью Приказа командира.

languages.text: Zu Beginn jedes {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} des {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Offiziers{/g} wendet dieser {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Stimme des Kommandos{/g} auf einen zufälligen Verbündeten an, der nicht {g|Encyclopedia:Overexerted}überanstrengt{/g} ist. Dieser Verbündete wird den Überanstrengt-Effekt nicht erleiden und kann erneut Ziel von {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Stimme des Kommandos{/g} sein.
languages.original_text: At the start of each of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g}, the Officer uses {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voice of Command{/g} on a random ally that is not {g|Encyclopedia:Overexerted}overexerted{/g}. This ally will not suffer the overexerted effect and can be targeted by {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voice of Command{/g} again.

traits.locale_text: Zu Beginn jedes {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} des Offiziers wendet dieser Stimme des Kommandos auf einen zufälligen Verbündeten an, der nicht {g|Encyclopedia:Overexerted}überanstrengt{/g} ist. Dieser Verbündete wird den Überanstrengt-Effekt nicht erleiden und kann erneut Ziel von Stimme des Kommandos sein.

languages.text: Au début de chacun de ses {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tours{/g}, l'{g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}officier{/g} utilise {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voix du commandement{/g} sur un allié aléatoire qui n'est pas sous l'effet de {g|Encyclopedia:Overexerted}Surmenage{/g}. Cet allié ne subit pas l'effet Surmenage et peut être à nouveau ciblé par {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voix du commandement{/g}.
languages.original_text: At the start of each of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g}, the Officer uses {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voice of Command{/g} on a random ally that is not {g|Encyclopedia:Overexerted}overexerted{/g}. This ally will not suffer the overexerted effect and can be targeted by {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voice of Command{/g} again.

traits.locale_text: Au début de chacun de ses {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tours{/g}, le Leader utilise Voix du Commandement sur un allié aléatoire qui n'est pas sous l'effet de Surmenage. Cet allié ne subit pas l'{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effet{/g} Surmenage et peut être à nouveau ciblé par Voix du Commandement.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Subay{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turu{/g} her başladığında {g|Encyclopedia:Overexerted}bitkin{/g} olmayan rastgele bir dost birim üzerinde {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Emir Sözü{/g} kullanır. Bu dost birim, bitkinlik etkisine maruz kalmaz ve {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Emir Sözü{/g} kabiliyetince tekrar hedeflenebilir.
languages.original_text: At the start of each of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g}, the Officer uses {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voice of Command{/g} on a random ally that is not {g|Encyclopedia:Overexerted}overexerted{/g}. This ally will not suffer the overexerted effect and can be targeted by {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voice of Command{/g} again.
